subject: Soccer
Corruption (Institutional)
Bribery and Kickbacks
Money Laundering
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Senators on the subcommittee overseeing consumer protection said they wanted to determine what involvement or knowledge U.S. Soccer officials had of the alleged criminal activity laid out in indictments unsealed last month.
snippet: Senators on the subcommittee overseeing consumer protection said they wanted to determine what involvement or knowledge U.S. Soccer officials had of the alleged criminal activity laid out in indictments unsealed last month.
